title: BREAKING! Landspace Zhuque-2 Reaches Orbit, China Wins Methalox Space Race
summary: China wins Methalox Space Race as Landspace, a private launch provider launches its Zhuque-2 rocket on its second ever flight. The Zhuque-2 experienced a nominal boost phase, stable orbit was confirmed, then the vehicle entered a spin.

title: NASA's Artemis Crew Transport Vehicles Arrive At Kennedy Space Center
summary: Today, NASA received their NASA's Artemis program fleet at NASA Kennedy Space Center; the fleet of specially designed vehicles will transport astronauts on the final leg of their journey to the Moon from Crew Quarters to Launch Complex 39B.

title: U.S. sharpens plan for military space race
summary: The latest U.S. military budget goes all-in on the notion that resilience will be a core feature of space programs. As evidence, the term surpasses 300 mentions in the Space […]

title: Astranis Announces Contract To Bring Internet To 2 Million People In Philippines Next Year
summary: Astranis set to build, deploy, and operate small geostationary broadband satellite with the capacity to connect up to 2 million people across 5,000 remote and rural communities in the Philippines in new long term contract with Orbits Corp, the satellite services arm of Philippine internet service provider HTechCorp.

title: NASA Astronaut Garrett Reisman Joins VAST as Human Spaceflight Advisor
summary: Vast Space has appointed former NASA astronaut Garrett Reisman as their Human Spaceflight Advisor; a strategic move that not only strengthens Vast Space's position in the commercial space industry but also signifies their commitment to excellence and innovation in the field of human space exploration.
